nodes.text: A planet was the planet that Naval Station Validusia, a Naval refitting station owned by the Galactic Empire, was orbiting. It had a bluish atmosphere, and was located in the Validusia system, which was itself located in the Bes Ber Bikade sector.

The planet was created by 3D modelling fan artist Ansel Hsiao for his artwork for the Naval Station Validusia, which he created specifically for The Essential Guide to Warfare released in 2012, which likewise adopted several vessels that he created as fanon and placed them within continuity. The planet's system was not supplied with a name until the October 25th update to the Online Companion to the Essential Atlas, where it was likewise named after the space station.
